title: Arcane telekinesis mage - (melee figther/ mage)
body:
A HIGH RISK / REWARD MAGE WHO CAN ALSO TANK... A SHORT AN SWEET GUIDE. (pretty much an extremely tanky ryze {{champion:13}} , or a self destruct karthus {{champion:30}} )

Resource - MANA

Auto attacks - melee

Passive - on death immediately explodes dealing aoe magic damage to near by enemies {{item:3135}} {{item:3089}} 

Q - Throws a targeted ball of energy which pulls him to the target [was thinking of pulls the target to him instead] {{item:3089}} 

W - Empowers next auto attack to deal bonus damage and stun the target (passively auto attacks to bonus magic damage {{item:3100}} {{item:3115}} 

E - Shield him self and taunts nearby enemies who get magic damage for attacking him (sheild scales of ap) (persist even if he is untargetable {{item:3157}} )

R - Makes a magical ring around him which enemies can enter but not exit. Which moves along with, (i.e) enemies are pulled along with them
     They take damage every time they touch the walls and extra magic damage on entry
     After the ring expires the inside of the ring fills with energy zapping enemies.
{{item:3157}} 

everything scales of AP

combo ideas ( w for next auto attack stun, q to bring closer e to taunt ,r to trap )
use your imagination
